page.title: 16Playing Fields
page.content: Both Allithwaite and Flookburgh villages are fortunate in having good playing fields. Allithwaite has two.The largest is 110m * 90m and has been developed by public fund raising.Opening in 1986 there will be a new Community Centre, which will offer excellent facilities with a number of rooms,a bar,kitchen and changing rooms. Regular football matches take place as well as Rounders,Cricket,garden parties,dancing exhibitions and the annual Carnival. A smaller field has a childrens play ground with a slide,swings,climbing frames and a rocking horse. Flookburgh Youth Club has a football field just outside the village,which is also used for other events.
